TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SiteMap extends System.Object
public ref class SiteMap abstract sealed

summary.span: 类是站点的导航结构在内存中的表示形式，导航结构由一个或多个站点地图提供程序提供。

span.span: The class is an in-memory representation of the navigation structure for a site, which is provided by one or more site map providers.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 站点映射使用结合， ，和其他控件来呈现用户浏览网站的有效导航接口。Site maps are used in conjunction with the , , and other controls to render an effective navigation interface for users to navigate a Web site. A对象是提供对使用导航的页和控件开发人员的只读站点映射信息的访问的 ASP.NET 站点导航基础结构的组件和控件。A object is a component of the ASP.NET site navigation infrastructure that provides access to read-only site map information for page and control developers using navigation and controls. ASP.NET 站点导航基础结构的其他组件包括和类、 Web.sitemap 文件和使用的各种控件类，如控制，用于以呈现内容和菜单。Other components of the ASP.NET site navigation infrastructure include the and classes, the Web.sitemap file, and the various controls that work with the class, such as the control, to render content and menus. 有几个函数：The has several functions: - 它提供了站点导航层次结构 （可以有一个根节点） 的根节点。It provides the root node of the site navigation hierarchy (there can be only one root node). - 它标识哪个站点映射提供程序是主体或默认情况下，提供程序。It identifies which site map provider is the principal, or default, provider. - 将跟踪的用于创建的所有提供程序对象。It keeps track of all the provider objects that are used to create the . 从根本上说，是容器的分层集合。对象。Fundamentally, the is a container for a hierarchical collection of objects. 但是，不维护节点; 之间的关系相反，它将它委托到站点地图提供程序。However, the does not maintain the relationships between the nodes; rather, it delegates this to the site map providers. 充当站点导航信息的接口 (形式对象)，由这些站点映射提供程序。The acts as an interface to the site navigation information (in the form of objects) that is held by these site map providers. 将跟踪的提供程序，它可以从中访问站点导航数据并公开其集合。It keeps track of the providers from which it can access site navigation data and exposes its collection. 一个提供程序可以以任何方式来存储其站点映射信息-，只要它扩展抽象类，类可以从它已成功初始化。A provider can store its site map information in any way—as long as it extends the abstract class, the class can be initialized successfully from it. 默认提供程序类是类，可使用 XML 配置文件时，Web.sitemap 配合工作。The default provider for the class is the class, which works with an XML configuration file, Web.sitemap. 但是，你可以编写你自己对象，并使用它来初始化你的站点的站点映射。However, you can write your own object, and use it to initialize the site map for your site. 有关自定义网站地图提供商提供的示例，请参阅。For an example of a custom site map provider, see . 指定默认站点映射配置了一个管理站点导航配置。A default site map configuration is specified that manages the site navigation configuration. 你可以重写此配置在 Web.config 文件中，您应选择编写你自己的站点地图提供商提供。You can override this configuration in the Web.config file, should you choose to write your own site map provider. 类提供的性能仅静态成员，并且它可访问在任何时候从 Web 窗体或 Web 服务器控件的给定站点中。The class offers only static members for performance and it can be accessed at any time in a given site from a Web Form or Web server control. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何声明一个 Web.config 文件中的站点映射提供程序。The first code example demonstrates how to declare a site map provider in a Web.config file. 第二个代码示例演示如何使用对象。The second code example demonstrates how to use a object. 下面的代码示例是 Web.config 配置节，它演示如何对象声明为默认值对象。The following code example is a Web.config configuration section that demonstrates how an object is declared as the default object. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用通过访问其静态成员，以显示有关的信息的对象和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object by accessing its static members to display information about the and properties. 将其与由呈现的输出比较控件。Compare it to the output that is rendered by the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_3/CS/sitemapcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.SiteMap_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_3/VB/sitemapvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property CurrentNode As SiteMapNode
public: static property System::Web::SiteMapNode ^ CurrentNode { System::Web::SiteMapNode ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个表示当前被请求的页的 控件。

span.span: Gets a control that represents the currently requested page.

value.span: 表示当前被请求的页的 实例；如果站点地图信息中不存在代表节点，则为 。

span.span: A instance that represents the currently requested page; otherwise, , if no representative node exists in the site map information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类检索通过请求从提供程序的属性。The class retrieves the property by requesting it from the provider. 如果不存在代表节点在站点映射信息页，或如果启用了安全修整且不能为当前用户，返回该节点`null`返回。If no representative node exists for the page in the site map information, or if security trimming is enabled and the node cannot be returned for the current user, `null` is returned. 由默认站点地图提供程序引发事件，如果一个或多个订阅存在。The event is raised by the default site map provider if one or more subscriptions exist. 如果您实现您自己对象，您可以创建自己的机制来查找和检索。If you implement your own object, you might create your own mechanism to find and retrieve the . 但是，如果扩展类和使用基于 URL 的方案，以标识页中，您可以重写方法。However, if you extend the class and use a URL-based scheme to identify pages, you can override the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，以检索表示当前页的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to retrieve the object that represents the current page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_1/CS/catalogcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.SiteMap_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_1/VB/catalogvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The site map feature is not enabled.

exception.span: 配置中指定的默认提供程序不存在。

span.span: The default provider specified in the configuration does not exist.

exception.span: 只有在低信任或以上设置的情况下运行时，才支持此功能。

span.span: The feature is supported only when running in Low trust or higher.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Enabled As Boolean
public: static property bool Enabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个布尔值，该值指示 Web.config 文件中是否指定了某个站点地图提供程序，以及是否启用了该站点地图提供程序。

span.span: Gets a Boolean value indicating if a site map provider is specified in the Web.config file and if the site map provider is enabled.

value.span: 如果配置并启用了某个站点地图提供程序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a site map provider is configured and enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定默认站点映射配置了一个管理站点导航配置。A default site map configuration is specified that manages the site navigation configuration. 你可以重写此配置在 Web.config 文件中，您应选择编写你自己的站点地图提供商提供。You can override this configuration in the Web.config file, should you choose to write your own site map provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是 Web.config 配置节，它演示如何对象被声明为默认值对象。The following code example is a Web.config configuration section that demonstrates how an object is declared to be the default object. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Provider As SiteMapProvider
public: static property System::Web::SiteMapProvider ^ Provider { System::Web::SiteMapProvider ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前站点地图的默认 对象。

span.span: Gets the default object for the current site map.

value.span: 的默认站点地图提供程序。

span.span: The default site map provider for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，使用对象，并且站点导航数据加载从位于站点的根目录中的 Web.sitemap 文件。By default, the object is used and site navigation data is loaded from the Web.sitemap file that is located in the root directory of the site. 这被确定中管理站点导航配置和 Web.config 文件的站点映射配置节的管理类。This is identified in the management classes that manage the site navigation configuration and the site map configuration section of the Web.config files. 默认情况下，它是实例类，该类使用 Web.sitemap 文件作为其持久存储区。By default, it is an instance of the class, which uses the Web.sitemap file as its persistent store. 但是，可以通过编写一个实现抽象类实现你自己站点映射存储和配置方案类。However, you can implement your own site map storage and configuration scheme by writing a class that implements the abstract class. 有关编写自己的提供程序的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on writing your own provider, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问默认对象为使用静态站点属性。The following code example demonstrates how to access the default object for the site by using the static property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_2/CS/catalog2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.SiteMap_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_2/VB/catalog2vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Providers As SiteMapProviderCollection
public: static property System::Web::SiteMapProviderCollection ^ Providers { System::Web::SiteMapProviderCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取对 类可用的命名 对象的只读集合。

span.span: Gets a read-only collection of named objects that are available to the class.
A of named objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中列出的站点映射提供集合是指那些在配置层次结构初始化指定类。The site map providers that are listed in the collection are those that are specified in the configuration hierarchy to initialize the class. 仅默认提供程序 (由标识属性) 保证用于期间初始化; 中的提供程序是否存在集合意味着它已在配置中指定，并已在初始化期间可用。Only the default provider (identified by the property) is guaranteed to be used by the during initialization; the presence of a provider in the collection means that it was specified in the configuration and was available during initialization. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检索集合从类，，然后循环访问它。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve the collection from the class, and then iterate through it. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_2/CS/catalog2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.SiteMap_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_2/VB/catalog2vb.aspx#1)] 如果你有多个只是为你的站点配置默认提供程序，你将看到显示每个提供程序。If you have more than just the default provider configured for your site, you will see each provider displayed. 例如，如果你正在使用示例 Microsoft Access 提供程序 (请参阅)，请参阅下面的输出：For example, if you are using the sample Microsoft Access provider (see ), you see the following output: ``` XmlSiteMapProvider System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider AccessSiteMapProvider Samples.AspNet.AccessSiteMapProvider ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property RootNode As SiteMapNode
public: static property System::Web::SiteMapNode ^ RootNode { System::Web::SiteMapNode ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个表示站点的导航结构的顶级页的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that represents the top-level page of the navigation structure for the site.

value.span: 表示站点的导航结构的顶级页的 ；如果启用了安全修整且不能为当前用户返回该节点，则为 。

span.span: A that represents the top-level page of the site's navigation structure; otherwise, , if security trimming is enabled and the node cannot be returned to the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类检索通过请求从提供程序的属性。The class retrieves the property by requesting it from the provider. 如果没有提供程序层次结构，类检索层次结构中的根提供程序的根节点。If there is a provider hierarchy, the class retrieves the root node of the root provider in the hierarchy. 若要访问默认提供程序的根节点，调用属性，用于检索默认提供程序并将其属性。To access the root node of the default provider, call the property, which retrieves both the default provider and its property. 对象，它是默认的提供程序为类，仅支持一个。The object, which is the default provider for the class, supports only one . 如果您实现您自己类并重写抽象属性，必须提供您自己的实现来跟踪属性实例。If you implement your own class and override the abstract property, you must provide your own implementation to track the property of the instance. 根节点必须对所有用户，设计使然可见。The root node must be visible to all users, by design. 如果根节点不是对所有用户可见时启用了安全修整，访问属性可能会导致异常。If the root node is not visible to all users when security trimming is enabled, accessing the property might result in an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，以检索表示站点，而不考虑当前页层次结构中的位置的根节点的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to retrieve the object that represents the root node of the site, regardless of the current location in the page hierarchy. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_1/CS/catalogcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.SiteMap_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_1/VB/catalogvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The site map feature is not enabled.
\- or -

span.span: The resolves to , which occurs if security trimming is enabled and the root node is not visible to the current user.

exception.span: 配置中指定的默认提供程序不存在。

exception.span: 只有在低信任或以上设置的情况下运行时，才支持此功能。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event SiteMapResolve As SiteMapResolveEventHandler

summary.span: 当访问 属性时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property is accessed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 订阅服务器附加为对静态对象可以接收通知的事件时访问属性。Subscribers attach a object to the static event to receive notification when the property is accessed. 这使用户能够实现自定义逻辑，在创建时表示当前正在执行的页，而无需自定义提供程序实现形式。This enables the user to implement custom logic when creating a representation of the currently executing page without requiring a custom provider implementation. 如果你订阅了事件，你还订阅上默认站点地图提供商提供的事件。If you subscribe to the event, you also subscribe to the event on the default site map provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理ASP.NET 网页，若要修改显示由站点导航控件，如的目标 Url 上的事件控件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event on an ASP.NET Web page to modify the target URLs that are displayed by a site navigation control, such as the control. 在此示例中，当前页是联机公告板或论坛中发布页。In this example, the current page is a post page in an online bulletin board or forum. 为了呈现更有意义附加了站点导航窗格中，通过导航控件显示的节点的 Url，与上下文相关的查询字符串。In order to render more meaningful site navigation, the URLs of the nodes that are displayed by the navigation control are appended with context relevant query strings. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 站点导航基础结构能防范无限递归，这提供了一种安全措施和与访问相关联的安全风险降至最低中的属性类。The ASP.NET site navigation infrastructure guards against infinite recursion, which provides a safeguard and minimizes the security risk that is associated with accessing the property from within the class. 下面的代码所属在 Global.asax 文件中。The following code belongs in the Global.asax file. 将应用程序一次附加事件处理程序。The event handler will be attached only once for the application. 该代码会识别页是否实现`ISiteMapResolver`接口。The code recognizes whether the page implements the `ISiteMapResolver` interface. 如果实现的接口，`ExpandForumPaths`调用函数。If the interface is implemented, the `ExpandForumPaths` function is called. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve/CS/sitemapresolve1cs.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve/VB/sitemapresolve1vb.aspx.vb#1)] 下面的代码定义单独的接口。The following code defines a separate interface. （在网站项目中，你可以将此代码放在 App_Code 文件夹中。）`ISiteMapResolver`接口定义`ExpandForumPaths`方法。(In a Web site project, you can put this code in the App_Code folder.) The `ISiteMapResolver` interface defines the `ExpandForumPaths` method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve/CS/sitemapresolve1cs.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve/VB/sitemapresolve1vb.aspx.vb#2)] 下面的代码所属的至少三个节点的页并在站点地图结构中的深度。The following code belongs with the page that is at least three nodes deep in the site-map structure. 页面实现`ISiteMapResolver`接口，它使`ExpandForumPaths`要调用方法。The page implements the `ISiteMapResolver` interface, which enables the `ExpandForumPaths` method to be called. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve/CS/sitemapresolve1cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve/VB/sitemapresolve1vb.aspx#3)]
